elementSpec.desc: contains information about a person's death, such as its date and place.
contiene informaciones relativas a la defunción de una persona, del tipo lugar y fecha.
contiene informazioni relative al luogo e alla data di morte di una persona
人物の死亡に関する情報を示す．例えば，日付や場所など．

attDef.desc: specifies the date of death in a W3C standard form (YYYY-MM-DD).
representa la fecha de defunción en un formato estándard del W3C (aaaa-mm-dd).
rappresenta la data di morte nel formato standard del W3C aaaa-mm-gg
死亡日をW3Cの形式(YYYY-MM-DD)で示す．
attDef.valDesc: a date in one of the formats specified in XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition

egXML.death: Passed away near Aix-la-Chapelle, after suffering from cerebral palsy.

remarks.p: Dates and place names, if included in the content of this element, should in general be tagged using the date and name elements respectively. If the additional tagset for Names and Dates is in use, the more specific elements defined by that tagset may be used as an alternative.
